alert.note: Alert for White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 18 at 8:41PM AKDT until October 20 at 4:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO 4 AM AKDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations one to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...White Mountains, Steese and Elliott Highway summits, and High Terrain South of the Yukon River. * WHEN...From 6 AM Thursday to 4 AM AKDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility to a half mile or less. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will increase overnight as a front approaches. For Thursday morning, southwest winds will begin to increase and peak Thursday afternoon through Friday night. Blowing snow due to strong and gusty winds will reduce visibility to half mile or less. The most significant impacts will be over Steese and Elliott Highway summits. Snow and winds winds are expected to decrease Friday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River
